name: Control the Body
description:
Control the Body

An esoteric platformer in which one is tasked to control a body.

This game will autosave your progress (if playing in a browser, it will use your browser's local storage).

Controls

You can remap controls by pressing the controller button to the right of the game once it starts. It should also support most joysticks. You can use this site if you want to check if your browser supports your gamepad: https://gamepad-tester.com/

ActionControlsAlternate ControlsMove and rotate body
Arrow keys
WASDHold breath
X
KJump (only with shoes)
hold button to jump higher
Z or C
J or L
Interact/talk (context sensitive)
Down Arrow
SPause Menu
EnterP Pause Menu OptionDescriptionContinueContinue playing
SFXTurn sound effects on or off
MusicTurn music on or off
TimerTurn the game timer on or off (useful for speedrunning)
Game Speed
Speed up or slow down the game.

Can be used as an accessibility option, but certain things will be very difficult, even at the lowest speed.
(X) Delete Save
Will delete your save file and restart the game
Inspiration

The following creators are my primary inspirations. If you like my game, please check them out!

  • @sylviefluff - http://love-game.net/
  • Stephen Lavelle - https://www.increpare.com/
  • @bfod - http://www.foddy.net/
